dimension: overall (not trimmed): 138 1/2 x 45 1/2 in. (351.79 x 115.57 cm)

text: Choosing the right shade of a particular flower is an important decision for both gardeners and textile designers. Such decisions often take into account the overall mood of the designed environment, the popularity of contemporary color schemes and, of course, personal taste.
title: Spice Garden
